title: Stepstowealth
author: Stepstowealth
content: The company you keep has a lot of effect on you. Many Investors who are also forum members would have stopped investing a long time ago or become inconsistent and uncommitted with their investment if they were not in this forum. There is something about being together with people with the same interest you have that I have noticed, their commitment can always motivate you when you feel like giving up, and help you make more stable decisions. Many investors who are not forum members will be finding it difficult to maintain their seriousness to invest regularly because they are doing things on their own. If many of those investors find this forum, it will be very valuable for them.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Always remember the phrase "never walk alone." There is this motivation you get from a forum like this that allows you to interact with like minds of your range, those beneath you, and those above you. Because you are a motivation to those just joining the forum, it pushes you to do better so the younger ones in the forum can see things they can learn from you. because you also have those above you, it motivates you to put in more effort which will accelerate you to the position of those above you and this makes it a win win scenario. By also reading and reacting to threads in the forum, it enlightens you the more.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: The forum is a good place to be, and there are a lot of people with the same motive, like you have said. There are also people who just pretend to have the same motive as you for reasons best known to them, but deep down they are not practicing what they preach. There are also people who are openly criticising your investment decision who are also here on the forum. The thing is that the forum helps one who wants to learn from them, and the forum is not the only thing that makes investors hope strong in holding their coins. The decision starts with yourself, followed by the information that we gather from others, and then we add it up to build our faith for those who believe or to increase our holding confidence. One thing about the forum is that you are opportune to learn a lot, adding to the things that you know.
